name: SoulHerder2
description:
Soul Herder 2
=========

Collect souls as fast as possible in this, exciting, 3D platformer. Are you fast enough to get to the top 5?

Collect as many souls as possible in the time allotted. Collecting souls increases your time. Gold souls count as 5. Keep your eye on the floor however as it will change as the game progresses and you will find yourself more and more reliant on your jumping ability.

Controls
=======

W,A,S,D or Arrows = Move
Space Bar = Jump
